sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-restaurant', templateUrl: './add-restaurant.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-restaurant.component.css'], }) export class AddRestaurantComponent { addRestaurant(form: NgForm) {} }

Add your favourite
restaurant

Name is required.

Name must be at least 4 characters long.

Type is required.

Type must be at least 4 characters long.

Location is required.

Location must be at least 6 characters long.

Description is required.

Description must be at least 10 characters long.
